programme.title: Extinct Or Alive

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Under Siege. Josh and Kim raise pigs in Virginia. But with pigs destroying their homestead and predators killing livestock, is it time to let go of their free-range dream? S1, Ep4

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Permit delays force the Poseidon Crew off road as they try to survive the season. Plus, the Dust Devils gamble big in the hope of finding fine gold. S5, Ep7

programme.title: Gold Divers: Under the Ice
programme.desc: No Fuel to Burn. Scott's dredge is literally running on fumes. Meanwhile, cocky newcomer Glen clashes with Zeke over how to best run the dredge. But who will get the last word? S2, Ep3

programme.title: Gold Divers: Under the Ice
programme.desc: Waterfalls of Gold. Pressure mounts as the days get warmer. Meanwhile, after months of work without taking time to grieve his best friend's death, Zeke reaches his breaking point. S2, Ep4

programme.title: Building Off The Grid
programme.desc: Mountain Timber Frame. A man who has always dreamed of living off the grid needs to finish his tricky build before winter arrives. He has taken on a huge project in upstate New York. S2, Ep2

programme.title: Demolition Down Under
programme.desc: A hardcore group pull down a massive shed. In Canberra, a five-storey block of flats has to go and a derelict greenhouse surrounded by snakes is demolished. S1, Ep1

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Brother Vs. Brother. Brothers Peter and Mick Cooke face off in a scrapheap challenge to build a opal hunting machine. And, the rookies resort to night time hunting. S1, Ep5

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A Brotherhood Tested. King Crab season kicks off with a 12 million pound Bairdi quota increase that causes a fishing frenzy. Plus, a boat is stolen the night before launch. S11, Ep1

programme.title: This Came Out Of Me
programme.desc: Bugs, Breaks And Eyeballs. Dr. Ruby Rose and her medical team need a delicate touch to remove a shard of metal from an eyeball. Plus, they extract an insect lodged in a boy's ear. S1, Ep2

programme.title: New: Mystery Diagnosis
programme.desc: The Baby Who Smelled Like Pancakes. On July 14, 1992, Sonya and Sherwood Webb welcome their second daughter, but they become alarmed when she begins to cry incessantly. S8, Ep5

programme.title: Yukon Gold
programme.desc: Snowy weather and machinery problems threaten to end Ken's season. Karl struggles to stockpile paydirt, and Cam mines ancient ground. S2, Ep8

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Tropic Thunder. The Raneys rescue a family descended from rock'n'roll royalty by reclaiming their homestead from the jungle on Kauai. But a dangerous flash flood causes issues. S4, Ep6

programme.desc: Fire and Icebergs. The Pomrenkes have competition from a mega-dredge crewed by Scott, Steve R gets stranded on an iceberg and Emily's first day as captain goes up in flames. S3, Ep6

programme.title: Building Off The Grid

programme.desc: Enjoying the bounty of Autumn, Analiese harvests her first honey, goes on her first hunt for venison, and takes her mentor, Peter Gilmore, foraging for wild mushrooms.

programme.title: Guide to Hunting Fishing & Wild Cooking
programme.desc: Analiese faces her biggest challenge yet, slaughtering the two pigs she's reared for meat, and is visited by old friends from the mainland, who reaffirm her commitment to her new life.

programme.title: Shamwari Untamed
programme.desc: It's a challenging day when John starts the process of introducing a new leopard to the reserve, Megan has her hands full with jackal pups, and the team races to put out a blaze that's out of control!

programme.title: Shamwari Untamed
programme.desc: Follow the team on mission-critical tasks: John monitors the new leopard, Johan performs surgery on a buffalo, and Peta Lynn and Megan care for two orphaned white rhino calves.

programme.title: Wardens
programme.desc: Michigan Conservation Officers serve warrants to a suspect believed to have taken 18 deer without licenses

programme.title: Wardens
programme.desc: November 15 is Michigan's firearm opener each year and is like Christmas for many hunters and Conservation Officers alike.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers
programme.desc: Join Jess and Stuart as they tangle with a large Eastern Brown Snake that's taken over a chicken coop!

programme.title: Dark Command
programme.desc: (1940) Western. John Wayne stars as a small-town sheriff during the American Civil War, who stands up to raids by the South's marauders, led by the local schoolteacher. With Walter Pidgeon.

programme.title: Attack!
programme.desc: (1956) Second World War drama starring Lee Marvin and Jack Palance. During the Battle of the Bulge, an inept and over-promoted captain causes a reconnaissance team's massacre.

programme.title: Lonely are the Brave
programme.desc: (1962) Western. Kirk Douglas plays a 1950s cowboy who, resenting government interference in people's lives, tries to free a friend (Michael Kane) who was jailed for helping immigrants.

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a drifter who arrives in a small border town and tangles with a group of villains after helping a wealthy young Mexican, played by Manuel Rojas.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: (2001) Scary sci-fi comedy. Can David Duchovny, Julianne Moore and Orlando Jones save humanity from a rapidly evolving, predatory alien species?

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: (2019) Sharp, eccentric murder-mystery with Daniel Craig as a detective anonymously hired to solve the death of a wealthy writer (Christopher Plummer). Strong language/violence/drugs.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: (2002) Disturbing horror. Remake of the 1998 Japanese phenomenon, with Naomi Watts. When her son watches a cursed video tape, a journalist has a week to save their lives. Strong language.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: (2014) Thriller starring Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner and Kenneth Branagh. A CIA agent is sent on a dangerous mission to Moscow to investigate a Russian tycoon. Violence.

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck!
programme.desc: (1960) Second World War drama. Kenneth More stars as the British captain charged with finding and destroying the Bismarck, Germany's largest battleship. Directed by Lewis Gilbert.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: (1998) Elijah Wood and Morgan Freeman are among the survivors of a meteorite strike that causes oceans to rise and tsunamis to engulf the land, in this premillennial sci-fi disaster movie.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: (1997) Action-thriller with Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman. When the US president's plane is hijacked by terrorists, POTUS himself decides to take back control. Strong violence & language.

programme.title: True History of the Kelly Gang
programme.desc: (2019) Intense fictional account of 19th-century bushman Ned Kelly's (George MacKay) journey into crime and life on the run. With Russell Crowe. Very strong language/violence throughout.

programme.title: James Martin's French Road Trip
programme.desc: James Martin's food adventure continues with a trip to Aix-en-Othe. He is joined by chef Lawrence Keogh to cook pan-fried pork with anise squash. S1, Ep15

programme.title: James Martin's Favourite Feasts
programme.desc: Game. Chef James Martin creates a menu using traditional game animals. He serves up a leaping salmon with cucumber pickle and then saddle of venison with spicy redcurrant jelly. S1, Ep2

programme.desc: Comforting Food. Dave and Si sample delicious home-cooked comfort food in northern England. Recipes include meat and potato pie, curry, and ginger sponge with custard. S2, Ep1

programme.desc: Big Game, Big Tastes! Molly Yeh brings big tastes to the big game! Her menu teams a corndog hotdish with her fried green beans with spicy ranch aioli and tangy pickle roll-ups. S12, Ep4

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Oh Canada - Yum! Molly Yeh shows her love for the best Canadian treats. She preps a ham and pineapple pizza, maple walnut Nanaimo bars and a bloody Caesar salad. S12, Ep5

programme.desc: Weeknight Dinners. Ina Garten focuses on comforting weeknight dinners. They include all-in-one skillet-roasted chicken and potatoes and seared salmon with spicy red pepper aioli. S19, Ep1

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa: Back To Basics
programme.desc: Simple Pleasures. Ina Garten makes the dishes that bring her joy. Her delicious menu includes giant crinkled chocolate chip cookies and cheddar and chutney grilled cheese. S19, Ep2

programme.title: Ainsley's Caribbean Kitchen
programme.desc: Ainsley is in the island paradise of Barbados. He cooks up a dish of roasted breadfruit, salt fish and lobster. Plus, he checks out a Bajan bakery and makes pineapple French toast. S1, Ep6

programme.title: The Great British Bake-Off

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa: Back To Basics
programme.desc: Bake It Delicious. Ina Garten prepares a marvellous make-ahead truffled mac and cheese. Plus, she puts a new spin on a bittersweet chocolate cake that everyone adores! S19, Ep6

programme.title: Ainsley's Caribbean Kitchen
programme.desc: In Dominica, Ainsley heads into the rainforest to the island's most famous waterfall. He makes twice-fried plantains on the beach and serves up flavoursome calypso chicken. S1, Ep8

programme.title: The Great British Bake-Off
programme.desc: Paul and Prue set three tough challenges for the remaining 10 bakers in bread week. They include their own versions of teacakes and an ambitious sculpture showstopper. S8, Ep3

programme.title: River Cottage Vegetables
programme.desc: Hugh hopes to inspire a group of schoolchildren by cooking them some delicious veggies. Later, he invites friends over for a meatless feast. S1, Ep7

programme.title: Lose Weight And Get Fit With Tom Kerridge
programme.desc: Chef Tom Kerridge challenges a group of volunteers to embrace healthier lifestyles and build positive relationships together, all fuelled by food they'll love. S1, Ep3

programme.title: Lose Weight And Get Fit With Tom Kerridge
programme.desc: Chef Tom Kerridge challenges a group of volunteers to embrace healthier lifestyles and build positive relationships together, all fuelled by food they'll love. S1, Ep4

programme.title: Ainsley's Caribbean Kitchen
programme.desc: In Dominica, Ainsley heads into the rainforest to the island's most famous waterfall. He makes twice-fried plantains on the beach and serves up flavoursome calypso chicken. S1, Ep8

programme.title: New: Spring Baking Championship
programme.desc: Sweets And Second Chances. The judges surprise the competitors by giving an eliminated baker a second chance. Host Molly Yeh challenges the bakers to make desserts featuring candy. S8, Ep8

programme.title: New: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: All Star Academy Face-Off. Four home cooks from All-Star Academy are ready for Grocery Games grad school. They start by making a fine dinner with wacky items from Guy Fieri's list. S8, Ep7

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The immature King of Youth decides to kidnap Tripitaka to gain the attention of Heaven and Earth.

programme.desc: We listen to a story about a new service that allows international residents to easily open bank accounts on their smartphones - it was launched by a Tokyo-based bank and a fintech firm in March 2023.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #33 How long does it take to get in? / To ask how long something takes, say 'donokurai' (how long and how much), then a verb like 'machimasu' (to wait), and finally add 'ka'.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colourful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: A small shop selling okonomiyaki pancakes has been a symbolic part of Kobe's recovery from the 1995 Great Hanshin-Awaji Earthquake - for three days we ask customers what makes this food so special.

programme.desc: The Cyborgs: Nate and Malika discover that some of the people they see every morning are actually cyborgs with a human appearance. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Nurture Your Garden
programme.desc: After a good start to the growing season, we're tuning up our tools, digging out the gloves and getting back in the dirt! It's time to give your plants the best care and get the garden guest-ready.

programme.title: QVC Extra Highlights
programme.desc: It's your second chance to see the fabulous products that have recently aired in our highlights show! With a range of cult products form iconic brands on offer, this is truly the best bits.

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: Deadly Chemistry. Poisons can be deadly and are often impossible to detect. Forensic experts show how they can solve these mysterious deaths. S1, Ep2

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: Frozen Killer. In 2004, Nurse Julie suddenly dies of kidney failure. When suspicious detectives look closely into the overly grieving husband, they discover a web of lies. S1, Ep1

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Just a Nice Guy. An unassuming teen disappears after becoming involved with an attractive young mum struggling in a difficult relationship. Where is he now and what is Misty hiding? S5, Ep68

programme.title: Murder On CCTV
programme.desc: In Long Island, a promising college student is shot dead in a botched robbery. Detectives study surveillance footage to track down two suspects. S7, Ep3

programme.title: Happily Never After
programme.desc: Final Status Update. When Cassie and Brent meet, it's a match made in social media heaven. But LOL turns to OMG when the bride goes missing. Is Brent to blame for her disappearance? S2, Ep7

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bridal Floor Bullies. One bride's traditional family wants to crush her dreams of a modern, form-fitting gown, while another bride's big sister tries to relive her own wedding. S4, Ep13

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Mama Gets Her Groove Back. Carol wants to knock her husband's socks off in a sexy gown during their vow renewal ceremony, but her son doesn't agree with her choice of dress. S4, Ep14

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress UK
programme.desc: Dress Dilemma. Ayesha falls in love with the first dress she tries on, but also loves the second dress as well! Plus, Nichale has another fitting and finds her dress is too small. S4, Ep7

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress UK
programme.desc: Under The Influence. Kristin wants the advice of her friends to help her find the perfect gown. Problems arise when she thinks she's found the one, but her friends don't agree. S4, Ep8

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Actor Derek Jacobi travels to Paris to learn more about his family history. He uncovers links to a wealthy Huguenot who fled religious persecution. S12, Ep3

programme.title: The Killer In My Family
programme.desc: John Orr. Relatives of 'The Pillow Pyro' John Orr reveal how his shocking crimes impacted the family and community. Were there any signs of his murderous intentions? S2, Ep6

programme.title: Murder On CCTV
programme.desc: We Never Fight. A family want answers when their 23-year-old daughter goes missing after a night out. Can security camera footage help detectives hunt down the person responsible? S6, Ep6

programme.title: Britain's Deadliest Lovers
programme.desc: Asher Maslin. Hollie Gazzard and Asher Maslin meet in a bar and fall madly in love - but Maslin is hiding his mental illness and when she ends it, he decides no-one can have her. S1, Ep3

programme.title: The Lady Killers
programme.desc: Hannegret Donnelly. Christopher Donnelly was found battered with 78 visible injuries in Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire. His wife, Hannegret, had been abusing him at home for years. S1, Ep3

programme.title: Michael Sams: Kidnapper Killer
programme.desc: A Cunning Plan. Exclusive audio recordings provide insight into the kidnapping of Stephanie Slater and her kidnapper's twisted game of cat-and-mouse with the police. S1, Ep1

programme.title: Signs Of A Psychopath
programme.desc: Ladies First. When a beloved elderly couple disappears, detectives discover their son not only lived off their charity but also took sadistic pleasure in murdering them. S3, Ep1

programme.title: Murder On CCTV
programme.desc: All That It Seems. A traffic accident on the Interstate near Des Moines, Iowa, kills a young mother. Police use construction work cameras to piece together her final moments. S6, Ep9

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: Fateful Crossing. When an officer dies in the line of duty, the fraternity of law enforcement bands together to make sure that justice is brought to those responsible. S5, Ep17

programme.title: Loti Borloti

programme.title: Y Crads Bach
programme.desc: Mae'r gaeaf yn dod ond dydy'r malwod bychain ddim eisiau mynd i gysgu - nes i Cai'r Grachen Ludw gael syniad gwych. Winter is drawing nearer - but the baby snails don't want to go to sleep.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Pan mae hudlath Betsi yn torri cyn iddi fynd i'r Gwersyll Teg mae Digbi'n penderfynu mynd ar antur i ddarganfod hen Hudlath y Corrachod. Digbi goes in search of an old goblin wand.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Pwy wnaeth ddarganfod tân?' yw cwestiwn Gweni heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu ateb dwl a doniol am Ani Cadabra, consuriwr o Oes y Cerrig! Today Gweni asks Tad-cu: 'Who discovered fire?'!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae'n galan gaeaf a thra bod Izzy a Magi'n paratoi parti yn y bwyty, mae Siôn a Jac Jôs yn gwersylla mewn coedwig gyfagos. Siôn and Jac Jôs go camping in the woods to conquer their fears!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Dewi a'r Ditectifs Gwyllt
programme.desc: Mae'r ditectifs ar waith unwaith eto ond y tro yma nid anifeiliaid gwyllt sy'n cael eu sylw ond ysbwriel! A rubbish job for PC Dewi and his team as they investigate a case of tipping.

programme.title: Y Dyfnfor
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Y Dyfnfor heddiw? What's happening in the deep seas today?

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Boom!
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen ola', mae'r ddau frawd yn mentro i'r dwr i weld sut mae flyboarding yn gweithio. In the last episode, the brothers head to the water to see how flyboarding works.

programme.title: New: Ffeil
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon dyddiol i bobl ifanc. Daily news and sport for youngsters.

programme.title: Cegin Bryn: Y Dosbarth Meistr
programme.desc: Mae Colin Owen yn galw ar Bryn am gymorth i ymestyn ei sgiliau coginio. Vegetarian Colin Owen from Pentir near Bangor asks Bryn for tips on how to expand his cooking repetoire.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae diwrnod yr angladd wedi cyrraedd, efo emosiynau pawb yn byrlymu i'r wyneb. Daw ymwelydd annisgwyl â llawer o broblemau. Wil and Caitlin huddle in grief. Will things be too much for Efan?

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Dychwela Kelly a Jason o'u mis mêl trychinebus. Mae Gaynor wedi cyrraedd pen ei thennyn gyda negeseuon dirgel 'Mrs Jones'. Gaynor is exasperated by 'Mrs Jones's strange messages.

programme.title: New: Sain Ffagan
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r garddwyr yn dysgu sychu blodau gan ddefnyddio dulliau traddodiadol. This time, curator Ceri Thompson is collecting stories and items for an emotive new Aberfan exhibition.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Hen Dy Newydd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r cynllunwyr yn adnewyddu 3 ardal mewn byngalo yn ardal Merthyr. In the third episode, our 3 creative designers transform three spaces in a bungalow in Merthyr.

programme.title: Alex Humphreys: Epilepsi a Fi
programme.desc: Mae Alex Humphreys yn wyneb cyfarwydd ar S4C; mae hefyd yn diodde o epilepsy ac am ddarganfod mwy am y cyflwr. Presenter Alex Humphreys, who has epilepsy, finds out more about the condition.

programme.title: Bwyd Bach Shumana a Catrin
programme.desc: Yr entrepreneurs bwyd Shumana Palit a Catrin Enid sydd yma i goginio eu steil nhw o fwydydd bach o'r cynnyrch lleol gorau. Welsh food entrepreneurs cook tapas-style food with local produce.

programme.title: ..programmes start at 6.00am

programme.title: Park Plaza 605
programme.desc: 1953. Crime drama directed by Bernard Knowles. A private detective solves a murder, which he was accused of. Starring Tom Conway, Eva Bartok and Sid James. [S]

programme.title: Personal Column
programme.desc: 1947. Mystery. Director: Douglas Sirk. Stars George Sanders, Lucille Ball & Charles Coburn. British police hunt for a serial killer who lures his female victims through newspaper advertisements. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Blackmail - Part 1. 1973. Stars Edward Jewesbury, Madeleine Hinde & Christopher Waite. The scorned lover of a married clergyman is accused of blackmail after threatening to expose their affair. [S]

programme.title: Broken Journey
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Directors: Ken Annakin & Michael C Chorlton. Stars Phyllis Calvert, James Donald & David Tomlinson. A plane crash lands miles from civilisation. The passengers must prevail. [S]

programme.title: A Question of Suspense
programme.desc: 1961. Crime Drama. Directed by Max Varnel. Stars Peter Reynolds, Noelle Middleton & Yvonne Buckingham. A young woman sets out to get revenge against a rich man who murdered her lover. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: This week spring is in the air! It's time for model trains, a trip on the QE1 in the 50s or 60s, we have a reel of a St. Patrick's Day celebration and is that Peter Cushing with Laurel and Hardy? [S]

programme.title: The Champions
programme.desc: The Dark Island. 1968. Stars Stuart Damon, Alexandra Bastedo & William Gaunt. Sharron and Craig pose as ship-wreck survivors and are taken prisoner by an island overlord. [S]

programme.title: The Main Chance
programme.desc: Fit Up. 1972. Director: John Frankau. Starring: John Stride, Glynn Edwards & Scott Forbes. David faces a difficult case in which a villain's alibi, if used, would be incriminating.

programme.title: The Night Holds Terror
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Director: Andrew Stone. Stars Jack Kelly, Hildy Parks & Vince Edwards. Based on a true story, a family are taken hostage and terrorised by a group of hitchhikers demanding a ransom. [S]

programme.title: Secret Army
programme.desc: Revenge. 1979. Stars Bernard Hepton, Terrence Hardiman & Clifford Rose. Albert receives information the Communists have set him up. Kessler investigates Reinhardt's involvement in the bomb plot. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Regina v Vennings and Vennings - Part 1. 1972. Stars Charles Keating, Peter Jeffrey & Michael Ridgeway. A father and son are accused of smuggling £200,000-worth of heroin into the country. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Regina v Vennings and Vennings - Part 2. 1972. Stars Bernard Gallagher, Jean Harvey & Lynn Dalby. As the case continues, witnesses take to the stand and there is an unexpected turn of events. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Regina v Vennings and Vennings - Part 3. 1972. Stars Charles Keating, Richard Warner & Peter Ellis. Paul's parents take to the jury box to explain his decision, but what will the verdict be? [S]

programme.title: Resurrected
programme.desc: 1989. Drama. Directed by Paul Greengrass. Stars David Thewlis, Rita Tushingham & Tom Bell. True story of a British soldier accused of desertion after being left behind in the Falklands after the war.

programme.title: Live It Up
programme.desc: 1963. Featuring music from the likes of Kenny Ball, Gene Vincent and Heinz. A pop film classic from the golden era. Dave (David Hemmings) and his mates are GPO riders who dream of becoming stars. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Ticket to Tokyo
programme.desc: 1959. A look at travelling from London with a Britannia Airline to Tokyo to discover Japan, and back via Hong Kong along with a look at the ocean liner Arundel Castle.

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Five To One. 1963. Directed by Gordon Flemyng. Stars Lee Montague, Ingrid Hafner & John Thaw. Alan Roper is a smart young man on the fringes of big time crime.

programme.title: The Secret Man
programme.desc: 1958. Thriller. Director: Ronald Kinnoch. Stars Marshall Thompson, John Loder & Henry Oscar. A physicist finds himself drawn into an investigation to track down a spy at his research station. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance
programme.desc: The Doctor and the Countess. 1954. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars Charles Boyer, Paula Raymond & Carleton Young. A plastic surgeon is asked to disfigure the face of a countess. [S]

programme.title: No Way Back
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. A boxer (Terence de Marney) begins on a downward slide losing his wife and money. A childhood sweetheart helps him but complications set in. [S]

programme.title: Interpol Calling
programme.desc: A Foreign Body. 1960. Starring Charles Korvin, John Crawford & Michael Balfour. With a body found, along with a supposedly clear suspect, Duval's investigations lead him to a nightclub in France.

programme.title: Top Secret
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Director: Mario Zampi. Stars George Cole, Oskar Homolka & Nadia Gray. A sanitary engineer is mistaken for a spy after accidently taking a suitcase full of plans for a secret weapon. [S]

programme.title: Today and Everyday
programme.desc: 1948. Factual. Directed by Cecil H Williamson, produced by E J Fancey and narrated by Frank Phillips. A rare short informative film with some superb vintage footage of locomotives.

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Regina v Vennings and Vennings - Part 3. 1972. Stars Charles Keating, Richard Warner & Peter Ellis. Paul's parents take to the jury box to explain his decision, but what will the verdict be? [S]

programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Director: Mario Zampi. Stars George Cole, Oskar Homolka & Nadia Gray. A sanitary engineer is mistaken for a spy after accidently taking a suitcase full of plans for a secret weapon. [S]

programme.title: Today and Everyday
programme.desc: 1948. Factual. Directed by Cecil H Williamson, produced by E J Fancey and narrated by Frank Phillips. A rare short informative film with some superb vintage footage of locomotives.

programme.title: Piccadilly Third Stop
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by Wolf Rilla. Stars Terence Morgan, Yoko Tani & John Crawford. A young playboy petty thief looking for the big time meets a New Yorker in London who is a bad tempered crook. [S]

programme.title: Fighting Man of the Plains
programme.desc: 1949. Western. Stars Randolph Scott, Bill Williams & Victor Jory. Jim Dancer, one of Quantrill's Raiders, stages attacks on Kansas on behalf of the fallen Confederacy. [S]

programme.title: Country Manners
programme.desc: An early public information film from the 50s educating visitors in the dos and don'ts of the countryside.

programme.title: Face The Music
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Directed by Terence Fisher. Stars Alex Nicol, Eleanor Summerfield & John Salew. An American musician, newly arrived in Britain, is implicated in the murder of a glamourous singer. [S]

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: The Sorcerer. 1956. Stars Boris Karloff, Ewan Roberts & Eric Pohlmann. A psychologist is murdered in a sealed room. Inspector March needs to decide who had the most reason to kill him. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1953. The Drayton Case. Directed by Ken Hughes. Stars Victor Platt & Vincent Ball. The aftermath of a wartime air raid reveals the body of a murdered woman. (S1, E01)

programme.title: Danger UXB
programme.desc: Dead Man's Shoes. 1979. Stars Anthony Andrews, Marjie Lawrence & Deborah Watling. Second Lieutenant Brian Ash joins his new regiment only to find that they are assigned to bomb disposal.

programme.title: The Human Jungle
programme.desc: The Vacant Chair. 1963. Stars Herbert Lom. When a managing director dies during a meeting, two men immediately compete for the position. Guest stars Lloyd Lamble and Hazel Hughes. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret's Patience. 1993. Stars Bruno Cremer, Agnès Soral & Claude Faraldo. Maigret investigates the murder of Manuel Palmari, a cunning criminal he had known for 20 years.

programme.title: A Hole Lot of Trouble
programme.desc: Directed by Francis A Searle. A 1969 comedy short centring around workmen digging a hole. Starring Arthur Lowe, Victor Maddern, Bill Maynard and Tim Barrett. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro welcomes you back into The Cellar Club for a night of fear and frenzy. We start off with Pulse, an electrifying horror directed by Paul Golding and starring Joey Lawrence. [S]

programme.title: Pulse
programme.desc: 1988. Horror. Directed by Paul Golding. Stars Cliff De Young, Roxanne Hart & Joey Lawrence. An intelligent pulse of electricity that travels between houses, targets a young boy and his father. [S]

programme.title: Pulse
programme.desc: 1988. Horror. Directed by Paul Golding. Stars Cliff De Young, Roxanne Hart & Joey Lawrence. An intelligent pulse of electricity that travels between houses, targets a young boy and his father. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Dead Men Walk is our second offering tonight. Caroline introduces the 1943 horror directed by Sam Newfield and stars George Zucco as both a physician and his twin brother, who rises from the dead. [S]

programme.title: Dead Men Walk
programme.desc: 1943. Horror. Directed by Sam Newfield. Stars George Zucco, Mary Carlisle & Nedrick Young. The twin brother of a small town physician returns from the grave to exact revenge upon his brother. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro presents the final offering, a different take on Bonnie & Clyde, with Thomasine and Bushrod. This 1974 film written by lead actor Max Julien was directed by Gordon Parks Jr. [S]

programme.title: Thomasine and Bushrod
programme.desc: 1974. Action. Directed by Gordon Parks Jr. Stars Max Julien, Vonetta McGee & George Murdock. In the early 1900s, a Bonnie and Clyde styled couple terrorise the south whilst pursued by a sheriff. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: You never know what you'll get down in The Cellar Club, so join Caroline Munro as she introduces three more films for next week. [S]

programme.title: Behind The Camera: Peter Cushing
programme.desc: A commemoration of one of our finest actors, Peter Cushing. This documentary mixes extracts from a rare radio interview from 1986 with new contributions from some of those who knew him best. [S]

programme.title: Mrs G Goes To College
programme.desc: Maxie's Silent Partner. Mrs. Green, an elderly widow, decides to fulfil a desire and enrol in college after raising her own children. Stars: Emmy Award-winning actress Gertrude Berg. (S1, E14)

programme.title: The Detectives
programme.desc: Piece Of Tomorrow. Captain Matt Holbrook (Robert Taylor) leads a squad of brave and tough detectives tackling crime. Also Stars: Tige Andrews, Russell Thorson, Adam West

programme.title: Let's Keep Our Teeth
programme.desc: 1952. Fascinating short film that takes a close look at teeth and focuses on how to keep your teeth healthy and well-cared for to prevent disease and decay.

programme.title: Dead Man's Evidence
programme.desc: 1963. Crime drama directed by Francis Searle and starring Conrad Phillips and Jane Griffiths. Phillips stars as a British secret agent investigating the discovery of a dead, washed up frogman. [S]

programme.title: The Six Men
programme.desc: 1951. Drama. Directed by Michael Law. A story tracing the activities of a gang of crooks whose long run of successful coups has the police in a panic. Starring Harold Warrender & Olga Edwardes. [S]

programme.title: The Onedin Line
programme.desc: The Hard Case. 1972. Stars Peter Gilmore, James Hayter & Godfrey James. James needs quick profits to regain control of the Onedin Line, but trouble awaits on his journey to the West Indies. [S]

programme.title: The Blind Goddess
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Director: Harold French. Starring: Eric Portman, Anne Crawford and Hugh Williams. Derek Waterhouse visits the Prime Minister to accuse Brasted of stealing money from the postwar fund. [S]

programme.title: Man From Tangier
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director: Lance Comfort. Stars Robert Hutton, Lisa Gastoni & Martin Benson. Chuck Collins finds himself involved in a passport and forgery racket, just through taking the wrong coat! [S]

programme.title: Upstairs Downstairs
programme.desc: The Sudden Storm. 1974. Starring: Jean Marsh, Angela Baddeley & Meg Wynn Owen. A downstairs dalliance and a happy outing to a seaside resort divert the staff as war looms on the European continent.

programme.title: Mr Hobbs Takes a Vacation
programme.desc: 1962. Comedy. Director: Henry Koster. Stars: James Stewart, Maureen O'Hara, Joe Carmody. Misadventures of a banker and his family trying to enjoy a vacation in a run down beach house. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Shares in Tomorrow
programme.desc: 1960. A look into the exciting world of stock exchanges and how a deal is accomplished between a broker and a jobber.

programme.title: Watch Out
programme.desc: 1953. Family. Directed by Don Chaffey. Stars Peter Butterworth, Humphrey Kent & Harry Lane. Dickie Duffle finds himself in trouble whilst touring a film studio. [S]

programme.title: Seven Thieves
programme.desc: 1960. Crime Drama. Directed by Henry Hathaway. Stars Edward G. Robinson, Rod Steiger & Joan Collins. A professional thief puts a team together to carry out one last heist at a Monte Carlo casino. [S]

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: The Wall. Stars John Gregson, Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. Netta's husband Michael has a big win on the football pools but then disappears. [S]

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: 1965. Adventure. Directed by Henry Levin. Stars Omar Sharif, Stephen Boyd & James Mason. An epic tale depicting a fictional account of the life and conquests of the historical leader Genghis Khan. [S]

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: 1975. Action. Director: Casper Wrede. Stars Sean Connery, Ian Mcshane, John Quentin. The chief of Scandinavian national security is tasked to rescue the passengers of a high-jacked British plane. [S]

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The Meow-Mazing Games: In the annual Meow-Mazing Games, Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the dollhouse trophy. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: The Fox and the Rolling Pin: Masha retells the story of 'The Fox and the Rolling Pin'. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: Axe Porridge: Masha puts her own spin on 'Baba Yaga' and gives a lesson on healthy food. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: Go I Know Not Whither: Once upon a time there was a king. He was very cranky and foolish. One day he wished to taste an exotic fowl and sent Yegor the huntsman to the deep forest. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: The Golden Cockerel: Masha's imagination is once more at work with the tale of 'The Golden Cockerel'. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: The Humpbacked Horse: Little Masha puts her own spin on 'The Humpbacked Horse'. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Masha's Spooky Stories
programme.desc: Soul Freezing Tale of Grim Forest and Tiny Timid Bug: Masha explains why there's no need to fear things like monsters, the dark and going to a new school. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Hooks And Loops Bear: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Fast Workout: The she-bear Grizzy is enamoured with has lost her favourite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it - impossible! (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bat-Grizzy: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favourite game on the ranger's mobile. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Moveable Apps: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the ranger's tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Wild Modelling: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the ranger's latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature form. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear Next Door: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side there is the same cabin, only it doesn't belong to a ranger. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Wild Zapping: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favourite programme. (S2 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Warning: Unlimited Lemmings: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge wind that is perfect for their extreme kiting game. (S2 Ep30)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bouncing Bear: While trying to stop the Lemmings, Grizzy slips on canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Fun Times With Animals: From watching the ants work hard, dancing the animal dance, or singing about how great pets are, there's so much fun to have with animals! (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Family time with CoComelon: Sing along with Cody about having a bath, or with TomTom about having a loose tooth and needing to go to the dentist and much more. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Brrrrr it's Freezing Cold!: It's super cold at home. Simon and Gaspard imagine that a bad guy is trying to turn them all into icicles! This is a mission for the Super Rabbit gang! (S4 Ep25)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The Anti-Lice Attack: Mom is scrubbing Gaspard and Simon's heads with shampoo. They have lice everywhere! Where in the world are all these lice coming from? (S4 Ep26)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The Runaway Hen: Grandma has taken the children to the farm. While she goes with the farmer to get cheese, she asks the kids to get some eggs. But when they open the door, a hen gets out. (S4 Ep27)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: A Super Team: Simon and Lou are playing badminton in the park. Ferdinand joins them but Lou loses the birdy in a tree. Simon and Lou throw pine cones at the birdy, but they miss. (S4 Ep28)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Mission: Find The Missing Keys!: Mom can't find the car keys. And she needs the car to take Gaspard to the dentist! Dad and Simon helps her look for them but Gaspard doesn't want to help! (S4 Ep29)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Snail Slime: While playing in the yard, Simon wants to play a joke on Ferdinand with a snail. Grossed out, Ferdinand inadvertently tosses the snail into the gaping hold of the old tree. (S4 Ep30)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Watch Out, Jellyfish About!: Simon and Gaspard are at the beach and they are very disappointed that they can't go swimming. Because the water is so hot, there are lots of jellyfish! (S4 Ep31)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Best Friends: Simon and Ferdinand are skateboarding together in the park. While arguing with each other, they fall off the board and it rolls down the hill and disappears from sight. (S4 Ep32)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Frogs In Danger: Simon and Gaspard have gone to the forest with Grandpa to see the frogs. They sing and croak, it's almost as if they were talking to the boys! As if it was a secret message! (S4 Ep33)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: The Sleepover: When one of Mazu's science experiments backfires, the dinos have to evacuate the den for the night. But where will they sleep? Mazu finds she can't get comfortable. (S3 Ep21)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Rocktastrophe: Rocky becomes so fixated on "helping" that he doesn't stop and think first about what he is doing. Instead of helping his friends out, he makes things worse. (S3 Ep22)

programme.title: Mighty Express
programme.desc: Skunked!: Red and Nico must deliver baby skunks back to the forest, but they get into lots of stinky situations along the way! (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Mighty Express
programme.desc: Nate's Castle Hassle: Nate must transport a giant castle the kids and trains of Tracksville need for today's Medieval Festival from Port Station to Central Square Station. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Octobella Strikes Again: Gekko is so anxious about facing a bullying villain, that he stays home one night to avoid her. (S5 Ep9)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Octobella on the Loose: Octobella creates a powerful octopus crystal that makes her a bigger threat than ever. (S5 Ep10)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Romeo's Space Machine: With the PJ Masks' help, Newton learns that he's not just "brains"; he can also use his powers to stop Romeo. (S4 Ep15)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Newton and the Ninjas: After Romeo, Newton has sworn off fighting villains. An old man (with ninja abilities) asks Newton for help, and in turn Newton asks the PJ Masks for help. (S4 Ep16)

programme.title: Masha's Spooky Stories
programme.desc: Bloodcurdling Saga About Joyful Event: Every single child is afraid to hear the news about one joyful event... about a new sister... who might spoil your toys and grab your cheesecakes... (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Masha's Spooky Stories
programme.desc: Monstrous Tale About Tall and Short: Even such tall animal as giraffe has its own fears... For example, he is afraid to lose n sight of his parents and become lost. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Masha's Spooky Stories
programme.desc: Frightening Incident at the Circus: A super scary story about one strange clown who suddenly became very angry! He scared all the children and made them cry a river! (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Masha's Spooky Stories
programme.desc: Shocking Story About a Girl Who Was Afraid of Everything: A girl was afraid of everything - until she met one boy who was fascinated by her scary stories... (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: How They Met: Far away in a little house by the railroad lives a very restless little girl called Masha. One day, she discovers the Bear's house and decides to play in it! (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Don't Wake Till Spring!: The Bear prepares for his winter bedtime by barricading himself from Masha inside the house. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Tracks of Unknown Animals: First snow falls and the Bear decides to teach Masha how to distinguish the tracks of different animals. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Prances with Wolves: The wolves that live in the forest come up with a plan to kidnap Masha and demand the Bear pay a ransom. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Jam Day: The Bear decides to harvest berries and cook jam. This idea literally lives up to Masha's taste. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Close Protection: The Lemmings clamour for their turn to play with the Ranger's mobile phone, but Grizzy isn't in the sharing mood. (S2 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Zero Visibility: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. Grizzy decides to try the trick on the Lemmings. (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intensive Care: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Gum: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Juice: Grizzy can't believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of chocolate spread and he hates it! A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added lemon juice to the jar. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Zen Bear: Grizzy discovers his beloved she-bear has a fondness for meditation, so he sets out to prove that he too can attain a Zen attitude. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Operation Super Big: Simon and Lou are at the park playing basketball. But they can't reach the hoop with the ball. They imagine this as a mission for the Super Rabbit gang. (S4 Ep34)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Look Out For Lightning!: Simon and Gaspard are playing in the garden, but it looks like a storm is brewing. Mom tells them to come inside. BOOM! The storm bursts. (S4 Ep35)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Professor Wolf's Bird: Grandpa has planted seeds and a blackbird is flying circles around. The kids have to chase it away. They imagine that this is a mission for... the Super Rabbit gang. (S4 Ep36)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The Dragon's Hat: It's the end of year costume show. Simon is dressed as an elephant, Lou is a dragon. When she can't find her dragon mask, it's like, no way can she go on stage! (S4 Ep37)

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy take care of her, and her Garden. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Spaceship: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Springtime for Bear: The Bear wakes up with the arrival of spring. While running around the forest, he stumbles upon a beautiful female bear. He quickly falls in love. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Gone Fishing: The Bear goes fishing. He slings his fishing rod, but as soon as the first fish swallows the bait, Masha appears and transforms a pleasant fishing trip into a nightmare. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.desc: Zero Visibility: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. Grizzy decides to try the trick on the Lemmings. (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intensive Care: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Gum: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Juice: Grizzy can't believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of chocolate spread and he hates it! A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added lemon juice to the jar. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Zen Bear: Grizzy discovers his beloved she-bear has a fondness for meditation, so he sets out to prove that he too can attain a Zen attitude. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Mission: Find The Missing Keys!: Mom can't find the car keys. And she needs the car to take Gaspard to the dentist! Dad and Simon helps her look for them but Gaspard doesn't want to help! (S4 Ep29)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Snail Slime: While playing in the yard, Simon wants to play a joke on Ferdinand with a snail. Grossed out, Ferdinand inadvertently tosses the snail into the gaping hold of the old tree. (S4 Ep30)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Watch Out, Jellyfish About!: Simon and Gaspard are at the beach and they are very disappointed that they can't go swimming. Because the water is so hot, there are lots of jellyfish! (S4 Ep31)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Best Friends: Simon and Ferdinand are skateboarding together in the park. While arguing with each other, they fall off the board and it rolls down the hill and disappears from sight. (S4 Ep32)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Frogs In Danger: Simon and Gaspard have gone to the forest with Grandpa to see the frogs. They sing and croak, it's almost as if they were talking to the boys! As if it was a secret message! (S4 Ep33)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Operation Super Big: Simon and Lou are at the park playing basketball. But they can't reach the hoop with the ball. They imagine this as a mission for the Super Rabbit gang. (S4 Ep34)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Look Out For Lightning!: Simon and Gaspard are playing in the garden, but it looks like a storm is brewing. Mom tells them to come inside. BOOM! The storm bursts. (S4 Ep35)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Professor Wolf's Bird: Grandpa has planted seeds and a blackbird is flying circles around. The kids have to chase it away. They imagine that this is a mission for... the Super Rabbit gang. (S4 Ep36)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The Dragon's Hat: It's the end of year costume show. Simon is dressed as an elephant, Lou is a dragon. When she can't find her dragon mask, it's like, no way can she go on stage! (S4 Ep37)

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy take care of her, and her Garden. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Spaceship: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden. (S1 Ep1)
